course_description: The first of two courses comprising a yearlong introduction to biblical Hebrew grammar, with an emphasis on reading the Old Testament in Hebrew. Standard reference works for biblical exegesis will be presented.
schedule_location: TTh 8:30am-9:50am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_447
